A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not what I expected\, but so much better actually.  So many people are going to moan and complain and whine about it not happening like they thought in their own minds\, but this was just great.  I can't wait until Episode 9 man\, and kinda wish Rian would just finish the series off\, but J.J....your up\, for now!
